alert.note: Alert for Clay (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 4:11PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jefferson, Garvin, Love, eastern Stephens, Carter, Murray, southwestern McClain and northeastern Clay Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 409 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Antioch to near Graham to near Grady to 9 miles southwest of Terral. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Locally heavy rainfall may produce ponding of water on roadways with minor flooing. Locations impacted include... Ardmore, Pauls Valley, Sulphur, Henrietta, Davis, Marietta, Lone Grove, Lindsay, Healdton, Wynnewood, Wilson, Maysville, Dickson, Ringling, Ryan, Springer, Elmore City, Velma, Paoli, and Thackerville. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 6 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
